amendment.description: To provide full and mandatory funding for IDEA beginning in FY2004.

vote.text: Amendment SA 409 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 28 - 70. Record Vote Number: 103.

action.text: Amendment SA 409 proposed by Senator Dayton. (consideration: CR S4406-4408; text: CR S4406-4407) To provide full and mandatory funding for IDEA beginning in FY2004.
